title: Surviving The Humans DEMO
description: Surviving The Humans is a 2D point and click adventure game and it is about a zombie trying to survive the incomprehension of humans, in the colorful 80s.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Something different, something new
<!--text-->
It is mainly based on the story of Cooper, a zombie who rises from his grave in the 80s in a cemetery without knowing anything about his past. We accompany him and help him throughout an epic story where he learns what it means to be a zombie, what is the new way they see him and how humans prejudge him. He tries at all times to survive the intolerance of the people. We saw that a story like this was never told, that zombies always have to be bad, murderous and monstrous. We always like to see things from another perspective, and this game seeks that same thing.

### Meet Cooper
Cooper is our main character he did not choose to become a zombie, he just came back to life and now that he has succeeded, he is going to do everything he can to stay that way. We will see that each action we take will have an impact on the rest of the members of the town, thus setting in motion a compelling story. His body is in full rot and it is difficult for him to keep his members together, but he has a lot of ingenuity and he will use it to fulfill his mission.


He is divided into two worlds, he simply still does not forget what it is to be a human, but he has to understand that he is no longer part of that reality, now he must learn that his body has changed, that no heartbeats in his chest. And that's why we want the player to embark on that learning journey.

### Are zombies bad? What do you think? We prefer to see them as different, and in many ways very human-like. We are not all bad.

He is characterized by his disadvantages, he has no strength, his body is in putrefaction. But Cooper will manage, based on his ingenuity, to turn those disadvantages into advantages.

### Main Features
You have to collect items, use them in the correct places to solve the puzzles, and help Cooper in this new adventure.
Many items to grab and use.
Hundreds of interactive objects with funny descriptions.
Mini-games to test his skills.
A suspenseful and one-of-a-kind story.
Multiple characters, locations, and items.
4 acts of pure action.
Learn how to be a real zombie and how to scare humans.

### Gameplay
We are based on the old but excellent Lucas Arts game adventures. With different touches that characterize our game. We believe that exploring interesting locations and fun examining objects will make for a fun and entertaining game.

Besides we leave you several nostalgic elements throughout history, to see if they find them all. At times we can control our hand or even our head from a remote location, using dismemberment as an advantage.

The game has autosave throughout the story, an inventory full of objects and puzzles that will make you think. But don't worry, there is also a hint system in case you have a hard time solving the puzzle and continuing with the game.
